communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All emails and other records released in response to FOIL requests 2016-002-00410 or 2017-002-00582. 

Note that the openrecords.nyc.gov website states that documents responsive to these requests "have been posted on the OpenRecords portal." However, no files are publicly available. A description of the records can be found on the following webpages:
https://www.politico.com/states/new-york/albany/story/2018/02/01/powerful-union-drafted-edited-fast-food-worker-bills-228603
https://a860-openrecords.nyc.gov/request/view/FOIL-2016-002-00410
https://a860-openrecords.nyc.gov/request/view/FOIL-2017-002-00582

This request is being made for non-commercial research purposes and the requested documents will be made available to the general public.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer that the request be filled electronically by e-mail attachment if possible.

Thank you for your assistance with this request. I look forward to receiving your response within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Peter Fugiel
Postdoctoral Research Fellow
Rutgers School of Management & Labor Relations

title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman  DA's office Faulkinberry

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman  DA's office Faulkinberry
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records from he DA's office on Wayne Faulkinberry, I believe I sent you FaulkEnberry and that was an incorrect spelling, thank you.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

communications.subject: RE: Texas Public Information Act Request: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman  DA's office Faulkinberry
communications.communication:
I will get this over to the DA’s office.
Thank you
